General Motors na opravy sťahuje státisíce áut, dôvodom je chyba softvéru
01 Nov 2019, 14:35 by Webnoviny
1.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Americká automobilka General Motors zvoláva na opravy viac ako 600 tisíc nákladných áut a vozidiel SUV, pretože chyba ich softvéru by mohla aktivovať brzdový systém, čo zvyšuje riziko nehody.
Zvolávanie sa týka áut Chevrolet Silverado 1500, Chevrolet Suburban, Chevrolet Tahoe, GMC Sierra 1500 a GMC Yukon. Automobilka uviedla, že celosvetovo je potenciálne dotknutých 653 370 vozidiel, ale nijaké nehody neboli hlásené.
Chyba softvéru by mohla spôsobiť, že vozidlo je ťahané na jednu stranu. Automobilka General Motors softvér zvolaných automobilov reprogramuje zdarma.

General Motors is downloading hundreds of thousands of cars for repair because of a software bug
01 Nov 2019, 14:35 by Webnoviny
US General Motors calls for over 600,000 trucks and SUVs to be repaired because software bugs could activate the braking system, increasing the risk of an accident.
The exclamation concerns the Chevrolet Silverado 1500, the Chevrolet Suburban, the Chevrolet Tahoe, the GMC Sierra 1500 and the GMC Yukon. The automaker said there were 653,370 vehicles potentially affected worldwide, but no accidents were reported.
A software error could cause the vehicle to be pulled to one side. General Motors will reprogram the summoned cars software for free.
